name: boii-d
description:
Take control of Boii-d, our 2D pixel austronaut, trying to get out if this color coded maze! With each level new challenges arise. Will you be able to save Boii-d from its pixel prison?

This game was developed for the Todo Game Jam 1. We followed the theme "This Was Unexpected"

Game design, programming and 2D art was created by @luisquid and @rsofia. 

Special thanks to @AliceBearmaid for helping bringing the game back from the dead. 

  • Environment art  by Unity Technologies.
  • Character by Mixamo.
  • 8bit sound effects based on https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/8-bit-sfx-32831
  • Ending music from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/loop-music-free-111896
  • Title font from https://www.dafont.com/paskowy.font
  • Campsite asssets from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/campfire-pack-1125...
